eng:
Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Many people are sitting at desks working.
- (2) There is a large display board on the wall.
- (3) The lights in the room are turned off.
- (4) There are structures visible at the top of the image.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Three people are sitting around a table.
- (2) The person in the middle has purple hair.
- (3) There are various foods on the table.
- (4) The person on the left is wearing yellow clothes.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) A yellow sculpture is located in the center.
- (2) The background building has the word "Local Stitch" visible.
- (3) A bench is located on the right side of the image.
- (4) There is a space with trees planted in the image.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) People are sitting in the café.
- (2) Large windows surround the café.
- (3) One person is standing in front of the cashier.
- (4) The café walls are yellow and white.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?

- (1) There is a coffee shop on the second floor.
- (2) The building's exterior is made of red bricks.
- (3) A no parking sign is visible.
- (4) An orange cone is placed on the sidewalk.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Various types of bread are displayed.
- (2) The staff member is wearing a hat.
- (3) The price tags of the bread are not visible.
- (4) A glass display case is used.
